name: TU LAN CAVE – 2 DAY ADVENTURE
description: This tour is perfect if you are short on time but still want a solid taste of adventure in the amazing Tu Lan jungle and cave system. The tour starts with time spent in a local village where you’ll have the chance to fall in love with countryside culture and ends up with a short but thrilling cave swim and waterfall after a strenuous jungle trek. The second day will include the majority of cave visits all around La Ken Valley and you will trek back to the village a different way.You will enjoy exploring Ken Cave, Kim Cave, Hung Ton Cave and of course Tu Lan Cave. You’ll also be subjected to a decent amount of trekking with over 12 km of tough jungle terrain covered over the two days and plenty of swimming!Once the day’s adventures are over get ready for a night in the jungle at our amazing Tu Lan campsite located by a beautiful waterfall. You’ll enjoy a delicious BBQ beside the campfire before turning in to the sounds of jungle critters and rushing waters of the nearby waterfall.This tour offers a glimpse into the amazing beauty of the Tu Lan area: caves, karst mountains, jungle, and waterfalls. You will experience trekking and camping in the jungle, caving, a chance for animal watching and fishing in the river. An unforgettable adventure is waiting for you!
